Key Match Events: Litton Das scored 56 off 24 balls in the powerplay.
Litton Das brought up his fifty in 21 balls.
India survived Litton Das scare in wet Adelaide.
Litton Das slipped and got run out after the rain break.
India's fielders executed a direct hit to run out Litton Das.
Arshdeep Singh bowled effective yorkers with a wet ball.
Post-Match Reflections: Shakib Al Hasan expressed frustration over the resumption of play in slippery conditions.
Shakib Al Hasan discussed the target and bowling quotas with the umpires.
Shakib Al Hasan showed a composed demeanor at the post-match press conference.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain interrupted play, reducing the game to 16 overs per side.
Bangladesh were ahead of the DLS par score when it started raining.
India's fielders and bowlers adapted well to the wet conditions.
